debug.name: Debug mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging.

isActive.name: Always active
isActive.hint: Keep module always activated (unless overridden by macro code).

hideChatInfo.name: Hide module info in chat window
hideChatInfo.hint: Hides the info text about this module in the chat window on game start (deactivate this option to see it again).

notifyOnChange.name: UI messages on toggle
notifyOnChange.hint: Show temporary UI messages whenever toggling on and off (also works when switching via macro code).

warnWhenON.name: Warning on activate
warnWhenON.hint: Show extra prominent UI message (warning) when toggling ON. Needs option "UI messages on toggle" to be enabled.

warnWhenOFF.name: Warning on deactivate
warnWhenOFF.hint: Show extra prominent UI message (warning) when toggling OFF. Needs option "UI messages on toggle" to be enabled.
